text:
Hi channel! We're trying to save an email section with smart rules defined by the Contact list membership.
If we select "Save Section" the section style is saved, but not the smart rules.
Similarly, creating an email template based on the email with the smart rules, the template doesn't carry the smart rules over.

Have you solved this problem before? How would you address it?
Thank you so much!

Has anyone had luck using the to parse a form field value into an array? So far in using hubl to set up a programmable email I can parse a string from a variable, but if I get the same string from a form field and it goes unparsed. Test Module: ```{% set default_string = "Stephen; David; Cait; Nancy; Mike; Joe; Niall; Tim; Amanda" %} {% set field_string = personalization_token("contact.sample_property_single_line", default_string) %} {% set default_array = default_string|split(";") %}

Default Array

    {% for el1 in default_array %}
  1. {{el1}}
    2. {% endfor %}
{% set field_array = field_string|split(";") %}

Field Array

    {% for el2 in field_array %}
  1. {{el2}}
    2. {% endfor %}
``` Output in test email (gmail): *Default Array* 1. Stephen 2. David 3. Cait 4. Nancy 5. Mike 6. Joe 7. Niall 8. Tim 9. Amanda *Field Array* 1. Stephen; David; Cait; Nancy; Mike; Joe; Niall; Tim; Amanda
